section.p: A patient-related event that automatically triggers an Order Action. For example, if the patient is scheduled for surgery, an particular Order Action might be placed on hold (i.e., "held") four hours before surgery.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] patientRelatedEventCode with data type Code
Identifies the patient-related event that automatically triggers an order action.

Contains zero or one [0..1] author, where its type is Author
Identifies the clinician who recorded that the Patient Event occurred.
